code compiled with :
CCFLAGS= -std=c++17 -g -fopenmp -O3 -march=sapphirerapids -funroll-loops -DSBD_TRADMODE

command-line options and env variables :
export OMP_NUM_THREADS=48
export GOMP_CPU_AFFINITY=0:47:1

mpirun -bind-to none -np 1 ../samples/selected_basis_diagonalization/diag \
--fcidump ../data/n2/fcidump.txt  \
--adetfile ../data/n2/alphadets.txt \
--bdet_comm_size 1 --adet_comm_size 1 --task_comm_size 1 --tolerance 1.0e-6 \
--iteration 1 --max_time 9600 --method 0 --block 20 --rdm 1

output :
